id: Valerie Jarrett on 'The Conners' reboot: 'This really isn't about me'
paragraph: By Lindsey Ellefson, CNNUpdated 2:51 PM ET, Sat October 20, 2018 Chat with us in Facebook Messenger. Find out what's happening in the world as it unfolds. (CNN)The woman who was the target of racist tweets that led to Roseanne Barr's firing from her namesake sitcom says "it really isn't about" her.
